name: Polaris Finance Polar
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Polar is a first algorithmic stablecoin on AURORA pegged to the price of 1 $NEAR (Native token of NEAR protocol - level 1 blockchain) via seigniorage. Aurora is EVM build on the top of the Near protocol. Polar is designed to follow the price of NEAR while pushing the price up and down to keep it close to the peg.
